title: I have a court date this week. I will be going to a maximum security prison. How often am I handcuffed as a prisoner and how often and how am I shackled? - Quora
tags: Legal Issues and Law in Everyday Life

response.answer_text: If it’s a max, expect to be shackled during all transport actions. Once you get to the Pen., They will put you in general pop. and you wont have to be chained. If you go the the hole, you will be cuffed up until they put you in the cell.
